pages.text: The use of the $(item)Infusion Basin$() is definitely one of the more expensive processes, as it requires $(l:alchemy/entry_base_materials)$(item)Purest Water$() as essential component.$(br)The basin is, as implied, used by pouring Purest Water into it. $(br)Then, essences are added.

Once the user feels like having added enough essences to this arcane stew, they can add an item to the Basin.$(br)If the item is able to absorb essences contained within the basin, it will get transformed, removing the essences needed.$(br)If the process is unsuccessful, a random essence will get consumed and $(item)Maganized Matter$() is left.
